title: Just saw a Lux make Rylai's...
body:
As much as I hate to see my favourite AP item surge in popularity and be taken at all times because of its efficiency,

I hate Lux more. 

Nerf the aoe or something?

EDIT: A lot of people seem to think I mean that Rylai's on Lux is a good build, hence the downvotes; no, that's not what I'm saying.
I'm saying that if even LUX is getting it, a really fucking pointless item for her, then there might be a problem with the item in one sense.

Similarly to Yasuo going non-crit bruiser/tank top or Tankko, the item is too efficient and people are catching on.

replies.body: rylais has nothing to do with lux her E already slows and they already made the change where cc no longer stacks in the game.

Rylai's applies the slow when the _damage is dealt._
Lux's E slows _before_ it deals the damage, and then Rylai's applies its slow _after._

Still not a huge deal imo, but you were incorrect there.

Some idiot doesnt know how to build = the item is OP?

Ive seen some dumb posts but...
Hard to say Rylia's is useful with her unnecessarily long multi-hit binding.
rylais would only affect the ult, what good is a slow on a bind?

i mean rylais does proc and not the in built slow on lux's e 

the only difference is 4% 

so even then op's statement is still invalid and it only applies for one second whereas lux without rylais would apply a 5 second aoe slow compared to a one second one. 

if that isn't happening and lux does get a 5 second slow from rylais then that would be a bug

Do you people not understand how Rylai's works?  The slow applies when _damage is dealt,_ so it is _not_ applied while her E is sitting there.  What it does do is apply a 40% slow for 1 second on enemies hit with her E _pop._
That's just a lux player that doesn't know how to build. It's not a problem with the item, just people that hear it's a good AP item and build it regardless of the champion.
rylias sucks on her. who the fuck buys this item on her
such a terrible item for a lux
